search_query: AirWatch MobileIron Jamf 2015 MDM market Apple device management

competitors.name: AirWatch (VMware)
competitors.notes: Cross-platform MDM acquired by VMware in 2014, supported iOS, Android, Windows Mobile, BlackBerry. Major MDM player but lacked Jamf's deep Apple expertise

competitors.name: MobileIron
competitors.notes: Comprehensive enterprise mobile management solution focused on security. Strong MDM player but didn't offer Jamf's level of customization for Apple devices

competitors.name: Cisco Meraki
competitors.notes: Cloud-managed IT solutions including MDM capabilities for mobile device management

competitors.name: FileWave
competitors.notes: Multi-platform device management solution supporting Mac, Windows, iOS, and Android

competitors.name: Mosyle
competitors.notes: Apple-focused MDM solution, founded 2012, particularly popular in education sector

competitors.name: Microsoft Intune
competitors.notes: Cross-platform endpoint management with integration into Microsoft ecosystem

competitors.name: Apple Profile Manager
competitors.notes: Apple's built-in MDM solution included with OS X Server

context: Jamf Holding Corp. is a Apple device management company focused on Apple enterprise management, security, and identity. Apple enterprise adoption accelerating.
